trans-unit.source: Create a Cordova app on Azure App Service Mobile Apps | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a Cordova app on Azure App Service Mobile Apps | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Follow this tutorial to get started with using Azure mobile app backends for Apache Cordova development
trans-unit.target: Follow this tutorial to get started with using Azure mobile app backends for Apache Cordova development

trans-unit.source: Create an Apache Cordova app
trans-unit.target: Create an Apache Cordova app

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial shows you how to add a cloud-based backend service to an Apache Cordova mobile app by using an Azure mobile app
trans-unit.target: This tutorial shows you how to add a cloud-based backend service to an Apache Cordova mobile app by using an Azure mobile app

trans-unit.source: backend.
trans-unit.target: backend.

trans-unit.source: You will create both a new mobile app backend and a simple _Todo list_ Apache Cordova app that stores app data in Azure.
trans-unit.target: You will create both a new mobile app backend and a simple _Todo list_ Apache Cordova app that stores app data in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Completing this tutorial is a prerequisite for all other Apache Cordova tutorials about using the Mobile Apps feature in Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: Completing this tutorial is a prerequisite for all other Apache Cordova tutorials about using the Mobile Apps feature in Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:
trans-unit.target: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:

trans-unit.source: A PC with [Visual Studio Community 2015] or newer.
trans-unit.target: A PC with [Visual Studio Community 2015] or newer.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Studio Tools for Apache Cordova].
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio Tools for Apache Cordova].

trans-unit.source: An [active Azure account](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: An [active Azure account](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: You may also bypass Visual Studio and use the Apache Cordova command line directly.
trans-unit.target: You may also bypass Visual Studio and use the Apache Cordova command line directly.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when completing the tutorial on a
trans-unit.target: This is useful when completing the tutorial on a

trans-unit.source: Mac computer.
trans-unit.target: Mac computer.

trans-unit.source: Compiling Apache Cordova client applications using the command line is not covered by this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Compiling Apache Cordova client applications using the command line is not covered by this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Create a new Azure mobile app backend
trans-unit.target: Create a new Azure mobile app backend

trans-unit.source: Configure the server project
trans-unit.target: Configure the server project

trans-unit.source: Download and run the Apache Cordova app
trans-unit.target: Download and run the Apache Cordova app

trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.target: Now that you completed this quick start tutorial, move on to one of the following tutorials:

trans-unit.target: [Add Authentication] to your Apache Cordova app.
